title: AHS: 1984 Episode 6 Preview Breakdown! | "Episode 100"
author: Think Story
comment: Tell me your episode 6 predictions below!

In Season 5 / Devil's Night at the Dinner Party, Richard Ramirez says he "stumbled into the hotel when he was younger" and met James March. It would be so cool if that's where he is during the hotel scene
Here's hoping even though the camp closed, Margaret gets what's coming to her.

I'm seriously hoping since it's the 100th episode we will get some OG cast cameos I know they have made a big deal about saying none is coming back but it's the 100th episode that's a milestone and with the flashes of all the past seasons there should be some connections

It’s weird how  ray dies and suddenly want to show remorse where as Chet tried to save everyone and look out for them but he didn’t come back as a ghost Chet deserved a return more than ray and I hope Donna or Brooke gets Margaret in the end bc she  it seemed as though everyone the only ones who was an exception to even be seen due to alligance with satan was jingles and Richard
description:
Time to breakdown and review American Horror Story's episode 6 preview "Episode 100" where we look for clues, theories, and easter eggs for what the show has in store.
